name:
New Style Boutique™
Update
description:
An update for New Style Boutique is now available from Nintendo eShop. This will update the software to Version 1.1.

This update corrects an issue that occurs after receiving the Open Back Turtleneck item in black. (Using the wardrobe to change clothes after receiving this item may cause the item to disappear.)

• Once the update has been downloaded, it will be installed automatically.

• If the update is successful, "Ver. 1.1" will appear on the title screen after launching the game.

We apologise for any inconvenience caused, and recommend downloading this update to ensure a smooth game experience.
